definition: square cun (Chinese unit of area: 1 cun × 1 cun, or 3⅓ cm × 3⅓ cm)/heart/mind

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
surname Fang
a unit of length/inch/thumb
(idiom) to become agitated/to get worked up
(idiom) confused/troubled/bewildered

sentences.english: Many people let anger and rage alter their decision-making skills.
sentences.chinese: 很多人因生气或愤怒而方寸大乱。

sentences.english: The gas is does, endure is the enemy, but to leave the bitterest curse of ground, children in crops.
sentences.chinese: 气是无明火，忍是敌灾星，但留方寸地，把于子孙耕。

sentences.english: His speech struck a perfect balance between humor and seriousness.
sentences.chinese: 他的演说把幽默性和严肃性的方寸掌握得恰到好处。

sentences.english: By employing the seemingly miraculous backhand painting technique, the art compacts the universe into a small space.
sentences.chinese: 它用神奇的内部反手画法将乾坤融于方寸之间。

sentences.english: Patty blew her cool when everyone started laughing at her.
sentences.chinese: 大家开始笑柏蒂时，她乱了方寸。

sentences.english: Beautiful mountains in confusion, Bodhi very lonely.
sentences.chinese: 方寸的山很美，菩提老祖却很寂寞。

sentences.english: Only want the square inch momentarily defends defends.
The sharp-eyed knight glance left and right under, obviously have already lost a square inch.
sentences.chinese: 锐眼骑士左顾右盼之下，显然已经失去了方寸。

sentences.english: He remained calm even in the face of danger.
sentences.chinese: 就是面临危险，他也方寸不乱。

sentences.english: A square inch place includes the infinite universe, small screen deduction in society all phenomena on earth.
sentences.chinese: 方寸之地包罗大千世界，小小荧屏演绎世间万象。

sentences.english: Farewell to the wound leave way, forget her, gin deep and shallow.
sentences.chinese: 惜别伤离方寸乱，忘了临行，酒盏深和浅。

sentences.english: If you can share, even if only a inch of land, that is priceless.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能占有，哪怕只有方寸之地，那也是无价的。

reluctance to leave this world/heart set on the mundane

Lingtai county in Pingliang 平涼|平凉[Ping2 liang2], Gansu
to confuse/to befuddle
miraculous hands of a healer/highly skilled person/brilliant move in chess or weiqi (go) 圍棋|围棋

three immortal souls in Daoism, representing spirit and intellect
